mapper.sql: created_by as createdBy, created_date as createdDate, updated_by as updatedBy, updated_date as updatedDate, id as id, loss_id as lossId, insure_code as insureCode, repair_name as repairName, repair_amount as repairAmount, audit_price as auditPrice, first_amount as firstAmount
mapper.insert: insert into fh_repair_item( created_by, created_date, updated_by, updated_date, loss_id, insure_code, repair_name, repair_amount, audit_price, first_amount) values( #{createdBy},SYSDATE(),#{updatedBy},SYSDATE(), #{lossId},#{insureCode},#{repairName},#{repairAmount},#{auditPrice},#{firstAmount} )
mapper.update:
update fh_repair_item set
insure_code=#{insureCode},
repair_name=#{repairName},
repair_amount=#{repairAmount},
audit_price=#{auditPrice},
first_amount=#{firstAmount},
updated_by=#{updatedBy}, updated_date = SYSDATE() where id=#{id}
and loss_id=#{lossId}
